subproject.description:
1.Standard codes and guidelines for Seismic evaluation and retrofitting of  buildings reviewed and adopted
2.Earthquake risk identified and vulnerability assessment conducted
3. Institutional capacity building for earthquake preparedness and mitigation conducted
4.Model projects to support mitigation measures for seismic  risk reduction implemented
5. Awareness on disaster risk preparedness and recovery at all levels conducted
6. Capacity at the national, district and community level reviewed,assessed and built
7. Sharing and exchange of national and regional information , lessons and best practices for policy feedback and advocacy facilitated
subproject.title: Earthquake Risk Reduction
